title: Saint Anthony of Padua
description: Saint Anthony of Padua; Taddeo Crivelli (Italian, died about 1479, active about 1451 - 1479); Ferrara, Emilia-Romagna, Italy; about 1469; Tempera colors, gold paint, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 10.8 × 7.9 cm (4 1/4 × 3 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 13, fol. 193v; J.
